# REST 实战

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/rest-shizhan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/rest-shizhan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install rest-shizhan
rest-shizhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g rest-shizhan
rest-shizhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
